comment: THIS IS THE BEST PROFESSOR YOU WILL EVER TAKE. she grades things with such detailed feedback that you have EVERY opportunity to improve your grade. She also offers extra credit a lot, and if she does,TAKE IT, because it will help you long term and make your life easier.  I got an A in both classes I took. you will not regret taking her classes.

Everything you want in a professor! Makes lectures engaging, responds to emails quickly, and offers a lot of extra credit. COMM 2135 is considered a very hard class, but Venter wants you to succeed and will do everything she can to help you understand the material, which makes the class way easier. TAKE HER.

Professor Venter is absolutely amazing! I am currently taking her Uses and Effects of Mass Media class,  and she has sat down with me to help me fully understand what we are talking about! She's also a good genuine person! Take Professor Venter for Uses and Effect next semester!

Venter is the best prof I have ever had. The course itself is quite challenging, therefore grading is pretty particular, but she wants you to be successful. She is super funny, supportive, and starts every class with everyone just catching up and talking, it is like a big family. She responds super fast and gives extra credit out like candy.
Great teacher, half way in and I would take her again she's a tougher grader but truly cares about the class

She is a great person, although she can be sassy sometimes. She even calls herself a little b**chy, (Yes she cusses alot). She gave video responses to every assignment we turned in online, which took alot of time and effort. You can tell she cares. This class is just extremely hard and specific. Therefore her grading is harsh and annoying.

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. SERIOUSLY. 

She is so understanding and caring of her students. She's a younger professor, so she understands. She makes a difficult class into something that's worthwhile, especially if you're already doing professional work. 

As long as you put in the work, you can easily get an A. Just TRY. TRY. Take my word for it.
My favorite professor I have ever had. Makes a difficult class entertaining and attainable. It is impossible to fail with her willingness to help you to succeed. Please take her if you can!

Dr. Venter was an amazing professor. She went out of her way to make learning fun, provided students with ample resources, and gave suggestions on different career paths you could take with a communication degree. She is one of the best professors I have ever hard. She is always there to support you, and responds fast to emails.

This professor is the best professor I have had so far in college. She gives the greatest career feedback on your major and good class feedback. She truly cares about each and every person in her class. Her class can be tough at times. As long as you show up to class every time, write down important notes, and just listen, you should be fine.

She is the best! She tries tot make the course relevant to her students. She genuinely cares about what's going on in your life and what you want to do. She also wants you to submit work you are proud of, so she is willing to work with you. 100% recommend her !

If you take this class with anyone else you will be bored out of your mind. She's the goat. If you're a pearl clutcher...well, Venter's class isn't for you lol. She curses a lot but knows her stuff. You will learn a lot.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Elaine Venter is THE BEST professor in the COMM department. She cares about you as a student and a person. She ensures that you are interested in the content by using examples that relate to everyday life. Regardless of your situation, Venter will work with you to guarantee your success in her class and you will leave with useful knowledge.
